post.body: well done. will be raising a glass for you later. cuz well, you really can't drink champagne without me.
Happy birthday love. Make big wishes.
CSI Miami? Really? :P
why are you still searching for chicks on myspace?
now everything is not essential and irrelevant.
obviously you were drinking too much in japan. welcome back.
your family would love twin sets, especially the ladies
Love awaits you around the corner at the next Starbucks. 1 bdr, 1.5 bath, tiny kitchen, Chelsea apartment here you come!
How very web2.0 to grow your userbase sans drunken, slutty photos.
cognitive dissonance. must be.
throat hurts. :(
Bacon makes every Friday a happy Friday
OH: I don't like mass hugging.
At Orson with @joannpeach, @daisysf and @tienh5. Starting the *almost* end of the week off right.
Sitting in the engineering cube. I like that there's more typing at this end of the building.
At the Brickhouse with @henrylyne. Fries and burgers!
Found in back of closet: Elbo Room booth photos with ex (toss), Chinese yuan currency (keep), and old cowboy boots (*scratches head*)
Listening to Cafeneon (yes, French pop) and making dinner for the third night in a row. I'm like OK with not being out, fancy that.
Eating Twizzlers for lunch. This is not a good sign.
Only old men and super anorexic girls at the gym tonight. I know I'm feeling good, how about you?
It's so cold today. I'm going to die in Europe.
Happy birthday @tienh5!
researching interior design courses for the spring
I just inhaled my dinner. Good thing no one was around to see it.
Guys from the Japan team are sitting next to me today. I must sound lovely blowing my nose every two minutes. Welcome to the US office!
Wrapping presents. Not sure how I ended up with so many gifts on a "non-gifting" year. Oh right, I'm full of that sentimental bullshit.
Working from home and being unable to connect to the VPN client = FAIL
Heater on: too hot. Heater off: freezing. The only solution to this is to sit around the house in shorts. BTW, can someone bring me soup?
At the bookstore browsing through new paperbacks. I could stay here all day of it weren't for the loud teenagers.
A drizzly Sunday morning. Listening to Booka Shade on the drive down to San Jose.
Home and bundled in sweats and fuzzy slippers. Thinking some wine and ambient tunes will make for a lovely evening in.
Hari Krishnas chanting in the streets. Oh Berkeley.
Meeting Leila in Berkeley for sandwiches and the street fair.
Never thought I'd end up at a porn company's holiday party. I'm moving on up apparently.
OH: You have a chic geekness to you.
Christmas Eve dinner at B.J. Brewery? Claaasssy joint. Now back home disabling the five clocks in my paren'ts guest bedroom. Love my life.
Having xmas drinks with Stef and the 60 other people who couldn't see their family sober either.
Blogging 'The Unusual Surroundings' http://tinyurl.com/7tp8ha
That's right. I am packed for Sunday on um, Wedsnesday. *-*
Am all packed into a single suitcase, albeit a large one but still! Quite an accomplishment considering that it's mostly winter clothes.
my face hurts from laughing. i suppose there could be worse things in life to complain about. ^-^
Margaritas with @daveman692 and Arthur. ++ Next up laundry and packing.
People are out shopping, the office is empty and the air is bitterly cold. Somehow it still doesn't feel like Christmas. I'm missing Santa.
Blogging 'Speak Out of Your Window' http://tinyurl.com/7bseoc
Forgot laptop at home again. Second time in a week. LAME.
Nice thing bout having friends in the Sunset is a guaranteed last minute dinner at your fave noodle place.
J.T. is in the office. Yay for old and favorite faces, especially during the holiday season.
Why is the office so cold? Have replaced hoodie with a wool coat.
Wow, a little SEO love really works. I come up for all but one link on Google's first page of results. And my design blog is listed #3. :)
Must remember to bring my headphones on vacation, makes work much more pleasant. Or hey, maybe I'm just relaxed. That's a novel thought.
Winding down from a wkd full of SoCal sun, college sports, fiji water, lots of white d√©cor and a couple of brown stars.
Ran to airport, flight delayed over an hour. Finally relaxing in Alaska Club Room with the 50 other people waiting to fly.
Damn 140 characters. That's the waitress growling about the burger not me. Meow.
